darks.log
类 LoggerHolder

java.lang.Object
  darks.log.LoggerHolder

public class LoggerHolder
extends java.lang.Object

Appenders's holder for async appender. It will be handled in logger thread. LoggerHolder.java

1.0.0
作者：
Liu lihua 2014-3-21
另请参见：
